text: Vijay Polaki (12 October 1992) is an Indian dance choreographer who predominantly works in Telugu cinema. He gained recognition for his choreography in films such as Palasa 1978, Pushpa: The Rise (2021), and Pushpa: The Rule (2024). ==Career== Vijay Polaki began his career as a choreographer in the Telugu film industry gaining early recognition for his work in Palasa 1978. His choreography for the song "Nadi Nakkilesu Golusu" in the film was well-received and brought attention. In 2021, he choreographed the song "Oo Antava" for the film Pushpa: The Rise. He continued his collaboration with the Pushpa film franchise by choreographing "Pushpa Pushpa" in the sequel, Pushpa: The Rule (2024). ==Filmography== Year Title Song(s) 2021 Pushpa: The Rise 2023 Baby all songs 2023 Kota Bomali PS "Lingi Lingi Lingidi" 2023 Hi Nanna 2023 Bubblegum 2024 Naa Saami Ranga "Dummu dukanam" 2024 Eagle "Gallantha " 2024 Gam Gam Ganesha all songs 2024 Double ismart 2024 KA "Mass Jathara" 2024 Pushpa: The Rule 2025 Mad Square College Papa 2025 Chaurya Paatam 2025 2025 "Oo Vennela" 2025 2025 2025 ==References== == External links== * Category:Living people Category:People from Andhra Pradesh Category:Indian choreographers
title: Vijay Polaki
